entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You have successfully gained membership in the Cabal. Soon, Loruna will contact you with your assignments.
entries.journal_entry_description: Of the myriad mercenaries in the galaxy, few have entry expectations as stringent as the Azure Cabal. However, they appear to be doing something right. Members of the group seem to have no trouble finding contracts, experience or credits. It appears to be worth the risks.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Loruna is waiting for all of her associates to either endorse or berate your performance.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Meet Loruna Scathe in Theed to claim your acceptance to the Azure Cabal and other rewards.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Propti Xaroon was a freelance Entertainer in years past. She left that life for one of espionage and joined the Azure Cabal at Loruna's invitation. Her endorsement will be valuable in your efforts to become a member as well.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Tweego is the highest ranking Bounty Hunter in the Azure Cabal, but he does not limit his sport to sentient species. He attributes much of his success in earning a living on bounties to having had to hunt for food as a youngling. Only proven hunters will win his respect and his endorsement.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Porgryn is instrumental in acquiring information from the streets and back rooms of Tatooine. She is also highly regarded by Loruna Scathe, so her endorsement is a critical step in becoming a member of the Azure Cabal.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Porgryn is instrumental in acquiring information from the streets and back rooms of Tatooine. She is also highly regarded by Loruna Scathe, so her endorsement is a critical step in becoming a member of the Azure Cabal.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Captain Broma Lak in Theed is the Azure Cabal's point of contact in Theed and a member of Loruna Scathe's trusted inner circle. His endorsement is critical in order to join the Cabal.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Having met Broma Lak on Naboo, complete the tasks he has assigned to you in order to receive his endorsement.
